title: App crashes when opening the settings menu
steps: 1. Open the app. 2. Tap on the settings icon. 3. App crashes immediately.
expected: Settings menu should open without crashing.
actual: App crashes immediately when settings menu is opened.

title: Text input field does not accept characters
steps: 1. Go to the login page. 2. Try to type in the username field. 3. Characters do not appear.
expected: Text input field should accept characters.
actual: No characters appear when typing in the input field.

title: Navigation bar disappears after scrolling
steps: 1. Open the app. 2. Scroll down on the homepage. 3. The navigation bar disappears.
expected: The navigation bar should remain visible while scrolling.
actual: The navigation bar disappears after scrolling.

title: Images fail to load in gallery view
steps: 1. Go to the gallery page. 2. Try to load images. 3. Images fail to load or display as broken links.
expected: Images should load correctly in gallery view.
actual: Images do not load and show as broken links.

title: Error message appears on checkout page
steps: 1. Add items to cart. 2. Proceed to checkout. 3. An error message appears during payment.
expected: Checkout process should proceed without errors.
actual: Error message appears during payment and prevents checkout.

title: Dropdown menu not responsive on mobile devices
steps: 1. Open the website on mobile. 2. Try to click on the dropdown menu. 3. The dropdown menu does not respond.
expected: Dropdown menu should be clickable and functional on mobile devices.
actual: Dropdown menu is unresponsive on mobile devices.

title: User profile picture upload fails
steps: 1. Go to the user profile page. 2. Click 'Upload Picture'. 3. Upload a profile picture. 4. The image fails to upload.
expected: Profile picture should upload successfully.
actual: Profile picture fails to upload, and no error message appears.

title: Slow loading time on search results page
steps: 1. Go to the search page. 2. Enter a search term. 3. The search results page takes several seconds to load.
expected: Search results should load quickly.
actual: Search results take a long time to load, causing delays.

title: Text formatting issue in the blog editor
steps: 1. Open the blog editor. 2. Try to change the text color. 3. Text does not change color properly.
expected: Text color should change according to selection.
actual: Text does not change color when selected.

title: Page layout breaks on smaller screens
steps: 1. Open the website on a mobile device. 2. Navigate to the homepage. 3. The page layout breaks and becomes unreadable.
expected: Page layout should be responsive and readable on all screen sizes.
actual: Page layout breaks on smaller screens, making content difficult to read.

title: Submit button does not work on the contact form
steps: 1. Open the contact form. 2. Fill in all fields. 3. Click the submit button. 4. Nothing happens.
expected: Submit button should submit the form successfully.
actual: Submit button does not trigger any action.

title: Audio not playing on video page
steps: 1. Open the video page. 2. Play any video. 3. The video plays, but there is no audio.
expected: Video should play with audio.
actual: Video plays, but audio is silent.

title: Image carousel not working on homepage
steps: 1. Go to the homepage. 2. Try to navigate the image carousel. 3. Carousel does not move or change images.
expected: Image carousel should be functional and allow users to navigate between images.
actual: Image carousel does not respond to user input.

title: Password reset link not working
steps: 1. Go to the password reset page. 2. Enter email and submit request. 3. No email is received.
expected: Password reset email should be sent to the user.
actual: Password reset email is not sent.

title: Pop-up notification not disappearing after action
steps: 1. Trigger a pop-up notification. 2. Perform the action to dismiss it. 3. The notification stays on the screen.
expected: Pop-up notification should disappear after the action is completed.
actual: Pop-up notification remains on the screen after the action.

title: Error loading user profile page
steps: 1. Login to the account. 2. Go to the profile page. 3. The page fails to load, showing an error message.
expected: User profile page should load successfully.
actual: Error message appears, and the profile page does not load.

title: Search bar not functioning after update
steps: 1. Open the search page. 2. Try entering a search query. 3. Search bar does not register input.
expected: Search bar should accept input and show relevant results.
actual: Search bar does not register text input.

title: Page layout is distorted on mobile devices
steps: 1. Open the website on a mobile device. 2. The page layout is misaligned, causing content to be unreadable.
expected: Page layout should be responsive and readable on mobile devices.
actual: Page layout distorts, and content overlaps or is hidden.

title: Video player controls missing on fullscreen mode
steps: 1. Open the video page. 2. Click on the fullscreen button. 3. Video controls are no longer visible in fullscreen mode.
expected: Video controls should remain visible when in fullscreen mode.
actual: Video controls disappear when the video is in fullscreen mode.

title: Form validation error not showing
steps: 1. Open the contact form. 2. Leave a required field blank and submit. 3. No validation error appears.
expected: Form should show a validation error if a required field is left blank.
actual: No validation error appears, and the form is submitted incorrectly.

title: Pop-up modal freezes after clicking close button
steps: 1. Open the website. 2. Click on any pop-up modal. 3. Click the close button. 4. The modal freezes and does not close.
expected: Pop-up modal should close when the close button is clicked.
actual: Pop-up modal freezes and does not close.

title: User login fails after password change
steps: 1. Change your password. 2. Try to log in with the new password. 3. Login fails.
expected: User should be able to log in with the new password.
actual: Login fails even after changing the password successfully.

title: Broken link in footer section
steps: 1. Scroll down to the footer section. 2. Click on any of the links in the footer. 3. The link redirects to a 404 error page.
expected: Footer links should lead to valid pages.
actual: Footer links lead to 404 error pages.

title: Text alignment issue in product description
steps: 1. Go to the product page. 2. Look at the product description. 3. Text is misaligned.
expected: Text should be aligned properly in the product description.
actual: Text is misaligned and looks uneven.

title: Date picker widget does not show calendar
steps: 1. Open the form with the date picker. 2. Click on the date input field. 3. The calendar widget does not appear.
expected: Calendar widget should appear when clicking the date input field.
actual: Date picker widget does not display.

title: App's notification system fails to update
steps: 1. Enable notifications for the app. 2. Receive a notification. 3. The notification status does not update after being read.
expected: Notification status should change after it is read.
actual: Notification status does not update, showing as unread.

title: Button not clickable in modal window
steps: 1. Open the modal window. 2. Try to click the 'Submit' button. 3. The button does not respond.
expected: The 'Submit' button should be clickable and trigger an action.
actual: The 'Submit' button is not clickable.

title: Mobile menu does not open on tap
steps: 1. Open the website on a mobile device. 2. Tap the hamburger menu icon. 3. Mobile menu does not open.
expected: Mobile menu should open when tapping the menu icon.
actual: Mobile menu does not respond to taps.

title: Icons not displaying on dashboard
steps: 1. Open the dashboard. 2. Check the icons in the menu bar. 3. Icons are not visible.
expected: Icons should display properly on the dashboard.
actual: Icons are missing or invisible in the menu bar.

title: Scroll bar disappears when resizing window
steps: 1. Open the website. 2. Resize the window. 3. The scroll bar disappears when the window is resized.
expected: Scroll bar should remain visible after resizing the window.
actual: Scroll bar disappears when resizing the window.

title: Pagination does not work on product list
steps: 1. Go to the product list page. 2. Click on the next page button. 3. No products load on the next page.
expected: Next page should load the products correctly.
actual: Pagination does not load the next page, staying on the current page.

title: Font size changes unexpectedly after page load
steps: 1. Open the homepage. 2. Wait for the page to fully load. 3. Font size changes for the main text.
expected: Font size should remain consistent throughout the page load.
actual: Font size changes unexpectedly after the page finishes loading.

title: Search functionality returns incorrect results
steps: 1. Use the search bar. 2. Type in a relevant keyword. 3. Results are unrelated to the search term.
expected: Search results should match the search keyword.
actual: Search results return irrelevant items that do not match the search term.

title: Login form freezes on submit
steps: 1. Open the login page. 2. Enter valid login credentials. 3. Click the submit button. 4. The page freezes after clicking submit.
expected: Login should submit and direct to the userâ€™s account page.
actual: Page freezes after submitting the login form.

title: Checkout page not updating order summary
steps: 1. Add an item to the cart. 2. Go to the checkout page. 3. The order summary does not update with the item added.
expected: Order summary should reflect the added item.
actual: Order summary does not update after adding items to the cart.

title: Product image zoom feature broken
steps: 1. Open the product page. 2. Click on the zoom feature for product images. 3. Zoom functionality does not work.
expected: Product image should zoom in when clicked.
actual: Zoom feature does not activate on product images.

title: Social media icons not linking to correct profiles
steps: 1. Go to the website. 2. Click on any social media icon. 3. The icon redirects to an incorrect or non-existent profile.
expected: Each social media icon should link to the correct profile.
actual: Social media icons link to incorrect or non-functional profiles.

title: App icon does not display correctly on home screen
steps: 1. Install the app. 2. Add the app icon to the home screen. 3. The app icon displays as a blank square.
expected: App icon should display correctly on the home screen.
actual: App icon shows as a blank square on the home screen.

title: Audio playback issues in mobile app
steps: 1. Open the app. 2. Play an audio file. 3. Audio stutters and cuts off unexpectedly.
expected: Audio should play smoothly without interruptions.
actual: Audio stutters and sometimes cuts off mid-playback.

title: User profile picture not updating
steps: 1. Go to the user profile page. 2. Upload a new profile picture. 3. The picture does not update after upload.
expected: Profile picture should update after upload.
actual: New profile picture is not displayed after upload.

title: Page title not updating after navigation
steps: 1. Open the website. 2. Navigate to a different page. 3. The page title does not update after navigation.
expected: Page title should update when navigating to a new page.
actual: Page title remains the same after navigation.

title: Slider control not functioning on homepage
steps: 1. Go to the homepage. 2. Try using the slider control to view different sections. 3. Slider does not move.
expected: Slider should allow users to view different sections.
actual: Slider control is unresponsive and does not move.

title: Dropdown menu disappears too quickly
steps: 1. Hover over the dropdown menu. 2. The menu appears for a split second, then disappears immediately.
expected: Dropdown menu should remain open until the user clicks or moves away.
actual: Dropdown menu disappears too quickly, making it difficult to select items.

title: Page not responsive on iPad
steps: 1. Open the website on an iPad. 2. Page does not scale correctly for mobile view.
expected: Page should be responsive and adapt to the iPad screen size.
actual: Page content is too large and does not scale properly for iPad screen.

title: Cart item quantity not updating
steps: 1. Add items to the cart. 2. Change the quantity of an item in the cart. 3. The quantity does not update.
expected: Cart should update the item quantity accordingly.
actual: Item quantity in the cart does not change.

title: User settings page loading extremely slowly
steps: 1. Open the user settings page. 2. The page takes an unusually long time to load.
expected: User settings page should load within a reasonable amount of time.
actual: User settings page takes more than 10 seconds to load.

title: Email confirmation not being sent after registration
steps: 1. Register a new account. 2. Expect an email confirmation. 3. No email confirmation is sent.
expected: An email confirmation should be sent after registration.
actual: Email confirmation is not being sent to the registered email address.

title: Video playback controls missing in embedded player
steps: 1. Open a page with an embedded video. 2. Try to interact with video controls. 3. Video controls are missing.
expected: Video controls should be visible and functional.
actual: Video controls are missing, preventing interaction with the video.

title: User cannot change password from account settings
steps: 1. Go to account settings. 2. Try changing the password. 3. The password change form does not submit.
expected: Password change form should submit and update the password successfully.
actual: Password change form does not submit, and the password is not updated.

title: Breadcrumb navigation not visible on product pages
steps: 1. Go to a product page. 2. Breadcrumb navigation is not displayed at the top of the page.
expected: Breadcrumb navigation should be visible on product pages.
actual: Breadcrumb navigation is missing from product pages.
